caption:
This photograph depicts a lively and colorful scene at a ski resort. It captures a group of skiers and winter enthusiasts enjoying their time at an outdoor seating area, likely at a cafe or restaurant on the slopes. Snow is visible on the ground, indicating a winter setting.

Foreground:
- The image is framed by a blurry foreground, possibly a snow-covered ledge or railing.

Middle ground:
- A group of people, mostly adults, dressed in vibrant 1970s-style ski attire, are seated around tables equipped with chairs and benches. The clothing includes brightly colored ski suits and jackets in red, yellow, and other vivid colors.
- Several individuals are donning sunglasses, and one person is wearing a distinctive red outfit with a matching red hat and pants, standing out noticeably.
- The atmosphere seems cheerful, with some people engaged in conversation, while others are more focused towards the camera.

Background:
- There is a wooden structure, possibly part of a lodge or a cafe, with large windows and snow piled up against and on top of it.
- Hanging decorations and additional seating areas can be glimpsed inside through the windows, contributing to a cozy, convivial environment typical of ski resorts.
- The ambient lighting suggests it might be late afternoon with shadows and warm sunlight enhancing the relaxed, vibrant setting of the scene.

Overall, the photograph's composition effectively conveys a sense of communal enjoyment in a winter recreational setting, highlighting the popular ski culture and fashion of the era.
title: Skiers have late day drink on the mountain
